R

ReadAndWriteMap - Class in com.riskgame.service
This class aims to load and existing map in the game and performs various validation to check if its a valid map.Post loading user can also edit a map.
ReadAndWriteMap() - Constructor for class com.riskgame.service.ReadAndWriteMap
 
ReadAndWriteMapTest - Class in com.riskgame.test
Test Class for ReadAndWriteMap Class
ReadAndWriteMapTest() - Constructor for class com.riskgame.test.ReadAndWriteMapTest
ReadAndWriteMapTest Constructor for initial setup
ReinforcementPhase - Class in com.riskgame.service
ReinforcementPhase class contains the methods needed for reinforcing the armies to the players during their turn.
ReinforcementPhase() - Constructor for class com.riskgame.service.ReinforcementPhase
 
ReinforcementPhaseTest - Class in com.riskgame.test
Test Class for ReinforcementPhase Class
ReinforcementPhaseTest() - Constructor for class com.riskgame.test.ReinforcementPhaseTest

removeAdjacency() - Method in class com.riskgame.service.CreateAndEditMap
This method aims to remove adjacency between two countries.
RiskMain - Class in com.riskgame.driver
RiskMain class launches the Risk Game and provided options for the users to create a new map or load an existing map in-order to begin the game.
RiskMain() - Constructor for class com.riskgame.driver.RiskMain
RiskMain constructor contains the action to be performed on the click create map, load map and exit buttons.
RiskPlayer - Class in com.riskgame.model
This class stores the value associated to each player.
RiskPlayer() - Constructor for class com.riskgame.model.RiskPlayer
 
RoundRobinScheduler - Class in com.riskgame.service
RoundRobinScheduler class is to iterate the Player turns.
